TopicTitle: What will you do when KSP reaches 10 years old?

Articles.Content: What will you do when KSP becomes 10 years old? I k now I'm going to go to Pol or Eeloo to demonstrate the new features.
Keep playing it. I have several games I still play that were released in the late 1990s and early 2000s.
I won't do anything astounding, since I will just play ksp like normal
Same as most, just keep kerbaling
